name: Spite & Malice LITE
description:
"Spite and Malice" also called "Cat and Mouse" or only "Spite", is a solitaire-game for two players. Be the first to play through his goal pile and win the game. But watch out: Do not overload your discard piles.

Challenge your friends via the Game Center or play against the computer, on the iPhone as well as on the iPad.

Get into the game quickly by aid of the step-by-step instructions.

____________________________________________________

Features:

* Multiplayermode via Game Center

* Play against the computer

* on the iPhone and on the iPad

* Soundeffects

* Step-By-Step Instructions

* different levels of difficulty
